statements: DELETE FROM manufacturing_data WHERE production_id = 100 AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM manufacturing_data WHERE production_cost > 5000 OR operational_cost < 1000;
DELETE FROM manufacturing_analysis_production_data WHERE production_date = '2022-09-15' AND company_id = 123;
DELETE FROM manufacturing_optimization WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 AND company_id = 456;
DELETE FROM manufacturing_analysis_production_data WHERE company_id = 1 AND production_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM manufacturing_optimization WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.7 AND optimization_date >= '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM ManufacturingCompanies WHERE industry = 'Automotive' AND location = 'Detroit';
DELETE FROM manufacturing_process WHERE process_name = 'Assembly Line';
DELETE FROM production_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
